pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["包含架构：",["$r","code",null,{"children":"i686"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"x86_64"}],", ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"aarch64"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"目前 AArch64 (ARM) 架构的 manjaro 源位于主源，manjaro-arm 镜像上游已不再更新。"}],"
",["$r","h1",null,{"id":"使用说明","children":"使用说明"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"生成可用中国镜像站列表："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}pacman-mirrors -i -c China -m rank"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"勾选"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["然后按 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"OK"}]," 键两次。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后刷新缓存："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}pacman -Syy","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Manjaro 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
